title: Ookiku Nattara Kekkon suru!
original_name: 大きくなったら結婚する！
sinopse:
For the past ten years I’ve had a crush on my childhood friend and neighbor who is two years older than me. Our childhood promise was to get married after I grew taller than her. Then why the hell is so hard for me to overcome the height difference!?

(Source: Plot Twist No Fansub)
